trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The SettingChangingEventArgs class provides data for the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> event, which signals that the value of an application settings property is about to change.
trans-unit.target: SettingChangingEventArgs 类提供数据<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging>发出信号，应用程序设置属性的值是将要更改的事件。</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging>

trans-unit.source: The most common source for this event is the `get` accessor of the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Item%2A> method in the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的最常见源是`get`<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Item%2A>中<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>类</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>方法</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Item%2A>的访问器

trans-unit.source: Because SettingChangingEventArgs is derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>, the handler has the option of canceling the write operation.
trans-unit.target: 因为 SettingChangingEventArgs 派生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>，此处理程序可以取消写入操作的选项。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The SettingChangingEventArgs constructor just assigns the values of the parameters to the corresponding properties in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: SettingChangingEventArgs 构造函数只需将参数的值分配给<xref:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs>类</xref:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs>中的相应属性

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the application setting.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含应用程序设置的名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a category description of the setting.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含设置的类别说明。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Often this parameter is set to the application settings group name.
trans-unit.target: 通常将此参数设置为应用程序设置组名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the application settings key.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含应用程序设置密钥。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the new value to be assigned to the application settings property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含要分配给应用程序设置属性的新值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要取消事件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new value being assigned to the application settings property.
trans-unit.target: 获取分配给应用程序设置属性的新值。

trans-unit.source: The actual type of the NewValue property should be compatible with the settings property being set.
trans-unit.target: NewValue 属性的实际类型应符合所设置的设置属性。

trans-unit.source: The latter is available though the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.PropertyType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> class.
trans-unit.target: 后者可通过<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.PropertyType%2A>属性的<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>类。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.PropertyType%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the new value to be assigned to the application settings property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含要分配给应用程序设置属性的新值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the application settings property category.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序设置属性的类别。

trans-unit.source: All application settings belong to a application settings group.
trans-unit.target: 所有应用程序设置属于应用程序设置组。

trans-unit.source: The group name can be explicitly supplied by decorating the class with a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupNameAttribute>; otherwise, one is generated using the name of the settings wrapper class.
trans-unit.target: 组名称可显式提供的修饰类<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupNameAttribute>; 否则，将生成一个使用设置包装器类的名称。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupNameAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a category description of the setting.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含设置的类别说明。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this parameter is set to the application settings group name.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，此参数设置为应用程序设置组名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application settings key associated with the property.
trans-unit.target: 获取与属性关联的应用程序设置密钥。

trans-unit.source: Each settings wrapper class, derived from <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>, has an associated settings key, which is a string that helps disambiguate different instances of the same wrapper in a single application.
trans-unit.target: 每个设置包装类，派生自<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>，有一个关联的设置键，这是一个字符串，可帮助消除歧义的同一个包装在单个应用程序中的不同实例。</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: Because each wrapper class defines a set of properties that represent application settings, the settings key can similarly help disambiguate their use.
trans-unit.target: 每个包装类定义一组表示应用程序设置的属性，因为设置键同样会帮助消除歧义其使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the application settings key.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含应用程序设置密钥。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the application setting associated with the application settings property.
trans-unit.target: 获取与应用程序设置属性关联的应用程序设置的名称。

trans-unit.source: Typically the settings wrapper class, derived from <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>, will be constructed so that the name of the application settings property will be the same as its associated application setting.
trans-unit.target: 设置包装器类，通常派生自<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>，将在构造，从而使应用程序设置属性的名称将与其关联的应用程序设置相同。</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the application setting.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含应用程序设置的名称。</xref:System.String>
